name: Meteor Mover
description:
Oh No! You suddenly got an alert on your phone, there is a meteor on route to destroy your house! You have 90 seconds to get LITERALLY everything out of your house and into the truck outside. Use arrow keys to move and run into items to pick them up. Run into the truck to put them into the truck.

This was a 1KrispWisp production. I will upload a devlog to my youtube channel soon hopefully! Music was created by Evan King below is the link to the music.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=miWN-WnQDLQ&list=PLr_tCs3gq-lVIkCYHlpESDZ5zEpriCRwS&index=12&t=0s

This was my first Game Jam! I am surprised that i got this done. Please leave any suggestions in the comments.
